mapper.sql: COLLECT_ID, COLLECTOR_CODE, AMNAME, MODEL, ZBRL, ZBNUM, JD, WD, SYS_CREATE_TIME, SYS_UPDATE_TIME, SYS_DELETE_TIME, SYS_PROCESS_FLAG, SYNC_STATE
mapper.select: SELECT line.CITY, line.BDZ_COLLECT_ID, bdz.AMNAME AS BDZAMNAME, line.COLLECT_ID AS XL_COLLECT_ID, line.AMNAME AS XLAMNAME, bds.COLLECT_ID, bds.COLLECTOR_CODE, bds.AMNAME, bds.MODEL, bds.ZBRL, bds.ZBNUM, bds.JD, bds.WD FROM t_cj_bds bds INNER JOIN (SELECT XL_COLLECT_ID AS XLINTERID, FROM_ID AS id, FROM_TYPE AS TYPE FROM t_cj_xld WHERE (FROM_TYPE = 7) UNION SELECT XL_COLLECT_ID AS XLINTERID, TO_ID AS id, TO_TYPE AS TYPE FROM t_cj_xld WHERE (TO_TYPE = 7)) xld ON bds.COLLECT_ID = xld.id INNER JOIN t_cj_line line ON xld.XLINTERID = line.COLLECT_ID INNER JOIN t_cj_bdz bdz ON line.BDZ_COLLECT_ID = bdz.COLLECT_ID where bds.COLLECT_ID = #{collectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT line.CITY, line.BDZ_COLLECT_ID, bdz.AMNAME AS BDZAMNAME, line.COLLECT_ID AS XL_COLLECT_ID, line.AMNAME AS XLAMNAME, bds.COLLECT_ID, bds.COLLECTOR_CODE, bds.AMNAME, bds.MODEL, bds.ZBRL, bds.ZBNUM, bds.JD, bds.WD FROM t_cj_bds bds INNER JOIN (SELECT XL_COLLECT_ID AS XLINTERID, FROM_ID AS id, FROM_TYPE AS TYPE FROM t_cj_xld WHERE (FROM_TYPE = 7) UNION SELECT XL_COLLECT_ID AS XLINTERID, TO_ID AS id, TO_TYPE AS TYPE FROM t_cj_xld WHERE (TO_TYPE = 7)) xld ON bds.COLLECT_ID = xld.id INNER JOIN t_cj_line line ON xld.XLINTERID = line.COLLECT_ID INNER JOIN t_cj_bdz bdz ON line.BDZ_COLLECT_ID = bdz.COLLECT_ID
line.CITY LIKE concat('%',#{city},'%')
AND bds.AMNAME LIKE concat('%',#{amname},'%')
AND BDZ_COLLECT_ID=#{bdzCollectId}
AND bdz.AMNAME LIKE concat('%',#{bdzAmname},'%')
AND line.COLLECT_ID=#{xlCollectId}
AND line.AMNAME LIKE concat('%',#{xlAmname},'%')
ORDER BY line.CITY,BDZAMNAME,XLAMNAME,bds.AMNAME

SELECT count(*) FROM t_cj_bds bds INNER JOIN (SELECT XL_COLLECT_ID AS XLINTERID, FROM_ID AS id, FROM_TYPE AS TYPE FROM t_cj_xld WHERE (FROM_TYPE = 7) UNION SELECT XL_COLLECT_ID AS XLINTERID, TO_ID AS id, TO_TYPE AS TYPE FROM t_cj_xld WHERE (TO_TYPE = 7)) xld ON bds.COLLECT_ID = xld.id INNER JOIN t_cj_line line ON xld.XLINTERID = line.COLLECT_ID INNER JOIN t_cj_bdz bdz ON line.BDZ_COLLECT_ID = bdz.COLLECT_ID
line.CITY LIKE concat('%',#{city},'%')
AND bds.AMNAME LIKE concat('%',#{amname},'%')
AND BDZ_COLLECT_ID=#{bdzCollectId}
AND bdz.AMNAME LIKE concat('%',#{bdzAmname},'%')
AND line.COLLECT_ID=#{xlCollectId}
AND line.AMNAME LIKE concat('%',#{xlAmname},'%')
mapper.insert: insert into t_cj_bds (COLLECT_ID, COLLECTOR_CODE, AMNAME, MODEL, ZBRL, ZBNUM, JD, WD, SYS_CREATE_TIME, SYS_UPDATE_TIME, SYS_DELETE_TIME, SYS_PROCESS_FLAG, SYNC_STATE) values (#{collectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{collectorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zbrl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{zbnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{jd,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{wd,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sysCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sysUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sysDeleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sysProcessFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{syncState,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into t_cj_bds
COLLECT_ID,
COLLECTOR_CODE,
AMNAME,
MODEL,
ZBRL,
ZBNUM,
JD,
WD,
SYS_CREATE_TIME,
SYS_UPDATE_TIME,
SYS_DELETE_TIME,
SYS_PROCESS_FLAG,
SYNC_STATE,
#{collectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{collectorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{amname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{model,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{zbrl,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{zbnum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{jd,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{wd,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{sysCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{sysUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{sysDeleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{sysProcessFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{syncState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update t_cj_bds
COLLECTOR_CODE = #{collectorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AMNAME = #{amname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODEL = #{model,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZBRL = #{zbrl,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ZBNUM = #{zbnum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
JD = #{jd,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
WD = #{wd,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SYS_CREATE_TIME = #{sysCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SYS_UPDATE_TIME = #{sysUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SYS_DELETE_TIME = #{sysDeleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SYS_PROCESS_FLAG = #{sysProcessFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
SYNC_STATE = #{syncState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where COLLECT_ID = #{collectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_cj_bds set COLLECTOR_CODE = #{collectorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AMNAME = #{amname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODEL = #{model,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZBRL = #{zbrl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ZBNUM = #{zbnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, JD = #{jd,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, WD = #{wd,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SYS_CREATE_TIME = #{sysCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SYS_UPDATE_TIME = #{sysUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SYS_DELETE_TIME = #{sysDeleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SYS_PROCESS_FLAG = #{sysProcessFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, SYNC_STATE = #{syncState,jdbcType=INTEGER} where COLLECT_ID = #{collectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
